languages.text: Научил{mf||а} Номос, что цель "огня" освещать и согревать, а не уничтожать.
Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.
languages.original_text: Научил{mf||а} Номос, что цель "огня" освещать и согревать, а не уничтожать.

traits.locale_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

languages.text: 你教导诺莫斯，火焰的目的是带来光明和温暖，而不是传播毁灭。
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: 你教导诺莫斯，火焰的目的是带来光明和温暖，而不是传播毁灭。

languages.text: Nomos beigebracht, dass der Sinn der Flamme darin liegt, Licht und Wärme zu spenden — nicht darin, Zerstörung zu bringen.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: Nomos beigebracht, dass der Sinn der Flamme darin liegt, Licht und Wärme zu spenden — nicht darin, Zerstörung zu bringen.

languages.text: Vous avez enseigné à Nomos que la flamme apporte la lumière et la chaleur, et non la destruction.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez enseigné à Nomos que la flamme apporte la lumière et la chaleur, et non la destruction.

languages.text: Has enseñado a Nomos que las llamas deberían dar luz y calor y no traer la destrucción.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: Has enseñado a Nomos que las llamas deberían dar luz y calor y no traer la destrucción.

languages.text: 炎の目的は破壊の種をまくことではなく、光と暖かさを与えることだとノモスに教えた。
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: 炎の目的は破壊の種をまくことではなく、光と暖かさを与えることだとノモスに教えた。

languages.text: Nomos'a, alevin amacının yakıp yıkmak yerine ısı ve ışık vermek olduğunu öğrettin.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that the purpose of the flame is to give light and warmth rather than sow destruction.

traits.locale_text: Nomos'a, alevin amacının yakıp yıkmak yerine ısı ve ışık vermek olduğunu öğrettin.
